summary: Comprehensive testing of Ventur startup pitch deck analyzer MVP completed. Backend APIs working well (87% success rate), frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX implementation.

ai_integration_issues.issue: Analysis returns error status when processing invalid PDF files
ai_integration_issues.symptoms: Gemini API error: 'The document has no pages' for malformed PDFs
ai_integration_issues.workaround: Expected behavior - proper error handling for invalid files

missing_features.issue: Logout functionality not implemented in UI
missing_features.selector: No logout button found in navigation or user menu

passed_tests: Landing page loads with dark theme and orange accents
Pitch deck page loads with upload functionality
Data room page displays all 8 categories correctly
History page loads and displays correctly
Data room categories API returns all 8 categories
action_item_for_main_agent: Implement logout functionality in the frontend UI. Add logout button to navigation or user menu to allow users to sign out properly.
